document_data.name: Grimes
document_data.mainbody: Sergeant-Major '''Grimes''' was an officer in the [[Golden Legion]] and replaced the captain of the Legion's cavalry. He was not too smart but loyal to orders.
document_data.History: After the death of [[Alvarro]], [[Cordell]] promoted Grimes as head of the cavalry. He led his cavaliers in furious fighting with the [[Viperhands]] at the start of the [[Night of Wailing]] in [[1361 DR]].
